thread.title: Lin-Manuel Miranda shares Galentine's Day playlist
thread.title_full: Lin-Manuel Miranda shares Galentine's Day playlist

author: Danielle Jackson
title: Lin-Manuel Miranda shares Galentine's Day playlist
text:
Email Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP 
Lin-Manuel Miranda really wants you to enjoy Valentine’s Day, whether you have a significant other or not. On Monday, the Hamilton creator shared a Spotify playlist that he put together just in time for Galentine’s Day, aka the Leslie Knope-inspired holiday in which women, single or taken, come together to celebrate being friends. 
The playlist includes powerful female-penned anthems including Queen Latifah’s “U.N.I.T.Y.,” Florence + The Machine’s “Dog Days Are Over,” and even “Ring of Keys,” from Lisa Kron’s musical, Fun Home . Miranda also included iconic girl groups like Destiny’s Child, SWV, and The Pointer Sisters. I made you an early Galentine's Day mix.All Ladies. 
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 13, 2017 Here's all the songs on it, make it on your music thingy of choice pic.twitter.com/tLMAsJ8EwS 
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 13, 2017 
Listen to the full playlist below.
